summary: THE BACK BRAKE LIGHTS ARE NOT WORKING AGAIN. (4TH TIME)  ALSO, THE CAR WILL NOT MOVE OUT OF PARK AFTER YOU START THE CAR.  I KNOW THESE TWO PROBLEMS ARE RELATED TO THE BRAKE SWITCH.  THIS ITEM HAS BEEN (REPLACED) TWO OTHER TIMES.  I AM PUTTING THE POWERS THAT BE ON NOTICE THAT IF I AM IN A CRASH BECAUSE OF THIS SAFETY ISSUE, I AM RESPONSIBLE FOR IT.  ALSO, THERE IS SOME SORT OF ELECTRICAL PROBLEM THAT WILL KEEP THE CAR FOR STARTING.  *JB
